doc:
Don Epperson https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Don_Epperson 0 Don Epperson (born.January 1938 - died.1973 in Arizona) was an American singer and actor. His daughter, Brenda Epperson is most well known for portraying Ashley Abbott on The Young and the Restless. Don_Epperson ( born.January_1938 - died .1973 in Arizona ) was an_American_singer_and_actor . His_daughter , Brenda_Epperson is most_well known for portraying Ashley_Abbott on The_Young and the_Restless .
